title: An unexpected error has occurred when sign in and cant start a game jAj
body:
Update: Now there's no unexpected error when I sign in, however same thing happens when i try to start a game...Client repair tried, compatibility tried..

Whenever I sign in/check my profile that unexpected error stuff will pop out. And when try to start a custom game, the game will crush and it says "The application was unable to start correctly (0*000007b). I just got my new allienware with win10 today so I think it must be my laptop's problem. However I've got all the direct/net frame stuff and I've updated my adapter driver. I have tried downloading the whole game again and used that client repair option.  So can someone plz help me out with this mess ;(

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [reinstalling the game completely](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).
I'm having the same problem, I just got a new PC too, I can still play custom games (I haven't tried online). But everywhere I go the error message pops up.
dota2 can run perfectly if it helps
